mapper.sql: id, collect_num AS collectNum, tags, html_origin AS htmlOrigin, content, images, cover_image AS coverImage, comment_num AS commentNum, state, like_num AS likeNum, editedAt, community_id AS communityId, title, member_id AS memberId, origin, watch_num AS watchNum, report_num AS reportNum, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt
mapper.select: (SELECT id,created_at FROM t_cmm_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} and state = 0 ) UNION (SELECT id,created_at FROM t_reply WHERE target_id in (SELECT id FROM t_cmm_comment WHERE post_id = #{postId} and state = 0) and state = 0) ORDER BY created_at DESC Limit 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT member_id,COUNT(*) as post_count,0 as eva_count,0 as like_count FROM t_cmm_post WHERE type = 2 GROUP BY member_id) a WHERE a.post_count >= 2

select p.id, p.title, p.content, p.cover_image as coverImage, p.video as video, p.member_id as memberId, p.updated_at as updatedAt, p.created_at as createdAt from t_cmm_post p
p.id IN
#{item}
order by updatedAt desc
SELECT SUM( greatest( IFNULL(watch_num, 0), IFNULL(boom_watch_num, 0) ) ) FROM t_cmm_post WHERE member_id = #{cardId}

select * from t_cmm_post cp where id in ( select cpc.post_id from t_cmm_post_circle cpc where cpc.circle_id = #{circleId} AND cpc.default_link = 0 ) and cp.tags = #{tagId}
order by cp.created_at desc
order by cp.last_reply_at desc
and cp.type = 2 order by cp.created_at desc

SELECT DISTINCT mpost.id AS id, postGame.post_id AS post_id, postGame.game_id AS game_id, SUM( watch_num + comment_num + like_num + collect_num ) AS wclc FROM
t_cmm_post mpost
JOIN t_cmm_post_game postGame ON mpost.id = postGame.post_id
AND state = 1
AND ( title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )
GROUP BY mpost.id ORDER BY
LOCATE( #{keyword}, title ) DESC,
wclc DESC,
LOCATE( #{keyword}, content ) DESC,
wclc DESC LIMIT #{startOffset} ,#{pageSize}

SELECT count(DISTINCT mpost.id) as ct FROM t_cmm_post mpost JOIN t_cmm_post_game postGame ON mpost.id = postGame.post_id AND state = 1
AND ( title LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') OR content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{keyword}),'%') )
